ctx: intros p q a HcanonP HcanonQ Hzero.
intros p q a HcanonP HcanonQ Hzero.
exceptions.tactic: unfold zeroP, eqP, mults, minuspf, minusP, projsig1, minuspp in Hzero.
exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce eqP to an evaluable reference.

original: intros p q a HcanonP HcanonQ Hzero. unfold canonical in HcanonP, HcanonQ. intros H. unfold zeroP, eqP, mults, minuspf, minusP, projsig1, minuspp in Hzero. destruct H as [l [Hminuspf [Hfst Hsnd]]]. unfold pluspf in Hminuspf. rewrite Hminuspf. apply H.
